categories.label: Clickbait / Spammy Language

rewrite.find: click here|get rich quick|act now|once in a lifetime|you won't believe|shocking|guaranteed results|instant results

categories.guidance: Avoid sensational or manipulative calls to action. Use clear, descriptive copy.

categories.label: Medical / Health Claims
categories.guidance: Avoid disease treatment/cure/prevention claims. Use soft, general wellness phrasing.

categories.label: Scam / Off-platform Signals
categories.guidance: Avoid directing users to private messaging apps or making financial promises.

categories.label: Destination Link Quality
categories.guidance: Use valid http(s) links; avoid excessive shorteners and misleading redirects.

hints.title: Use a clear, honest title that matches the landing page.
hints.description: Describe the content and expected outcome without hype.
